alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 17 at 2:53PM EST until December 18 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Northern Erie and Genesee counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times with deep snow cover and poor visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4303 7841 4308 7844 4308 7867 4310 7867 4302 7904 4293 7897 4288 7889 4283 7883 4289 7873 4293 7855 TIME Y22M12D17T1500Z-Y22M12D18T0000Z COORD...4289 7859 4296 7859 4299 7866 4297 7893 4293 7897 4288 7889 4279 7890 4273 7894 4280 7878 4282 7872 TIME Y22M12D18T0000Z-Y22M12D18T0600Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
